snippet: “Nutcrackers” by Pennsylvania Ballet, Manhattan Youth Ballet and Valentina Kozlova’s conservatory each yield different pleasures.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay observes that performances of The Nutcracker ballet by Pennsylvania Ballet, Manhattan Youth Ballet and Valentina Kozlova’s dance conservatory each yield different pleasures.
lead_paragraph: “Nutcrackers” by Pennsylvania Ballet, Manhattan Youth Ballet and Valentina Kozlova’s conservatory each yield different pleasures.
